## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] New component
- [ ] New feature (non-component)

## Checklist

- [ ] `npm run build` passes
- [ ] `npm test` passes
- [ ] New components are registered in `src/registry/components.ts`
- [ ] CSS presets added if needed
- [ ] README updated if adding new components
